product_name: Granite Gear Quetico Canoe Portage Pack - Regular
long_description: Designed for canoe tripping, the Quetico is the medium-sized pack in Granite Gear's Expedition Series. Updated design is now built with Cordura(R) nylon--it's every bit as strong as former material but much lighter. Ballistic nylon bottom plus stress points are bartacked for durability. Anatomically designed harness system and foam padded back panel hugs your body to keep the load close to your back and on your hips for stability. Side compression system allows you to stabilize the load and lash on extra gear; extra long lid covers the top even when you overfill the pack. Bomber side lift straps and haul loops make transferring the pack from the canoe to your back an easy task. New design features a large pocket on front to stow wet clothes where they won't come into contact with pack's contents. Built to fit torsos ranging from 18 to 22 inches in length.
short_description: Designed for canoe tripping, the Quetico is the medium-sized pack in Granite Gear's Expedition Series.
